selected_quotes: Presence of certain gut microbes could explain why treatments for illnesses such as cancer don't work in some people
Evidence suggests a person's microbiome can stop drugs working for certain conditions
Important to mention Jeremy Nicholson et al contribution(s) to this area
Comment la présence de certaines #bactéries du #microbiome intestinal peut rendre inefficaces des #traitements
Further discussion re. the gut microbiota and how it can impact on the activity of drugs

citation.title: Gut bacteria can stop cancer drugs from working
